changeSet.author: unknow
changeSet.sql: MERGE INTO price p USING (VALUES('2020-11-11', 123.11, 1, {'93u4hty'})) v ON v.column3 = p.countryid AND v.column4 = p.partnum WHEN NOT MATCHED INSERT VALUES(v.column1, v.column2, v.column3, v.column4) WHEN MATCHED UPDATE SET pridate = v.column1, rrp = v.column2;
